column4: hey guys, I have 2 problems. First off, grub won't boot into my windows partition. I had the same problem with fedora, but not with gentoo. Second, DNS resolution takes forever in Ubuntu, but not Windows, Mac, or Gentoo.
I may have used that incorrectly, not sure
